p.k: The Wild West meets the soulful sound of Italy. Fearless New York gangsters meet cowboys from the dusty prairie. And the magic of cinema meets the rich sound of a first-class symphony orchestra with this performance of soundtracks from Ennio Morricone, Nino Rota, Sonny Bono, and Bernard Herrmann.
p.d: This exclusive live concert production presents a unique selection of movie classics - from Sergio Leone's iconic Spaghetti Westerns to modern mafia masterpieces by Francis Ford Coppola and the cult movies of Tarantino. The Danish National Symphony Orchestra and Concert Choir are conducted by Sarah Hicks in this premiere performance of authentic soundtracks by composer legends Ennio Morricone, Nino Rota, Sonny Bono, and Bernard Herrmann. Soloists for this performance are Tuva Semmingsen (mezzo), Christine Nonbo Andersen (soprano), Hans Ulrik (saxophone) and Mads Kj?lby (guitars). Recorded at the DR Koncerthuset in Copenhagen, Denmark in 2018.
